about_the_game:
Don't want to grind? Get all [Winter 2019 Red] decorations for a slight bargain with this DLC!

Included Items:
White Carpet
Plain Red
Snowman Poster
Table Snowman
Snowflakes Neon (Animated)
White Counter
Modern Register
Ball Ornament Colored
Evergreen Tree
Wreath
Red Cloth
String Light Colored
Winter Garland
Deer Bud

**PLEASE NOTE:
If you already own any item from the list, purchasing this DLC will not provide you an extra set/ duplicate nor be discounted off of the final price. You will only receive the items you have yet to obtain.
